subject: AI & Agents
title: Alerting on Model Degradation
description: A 60-second lesson on Alerting on Model Degradation.

hook.text: At 3 AM, the model starts returning garbage predictions. Nobody finds out until Monday.

buildup.text: Alerts trigger when metrics cross thresholds: accuracy drops, latency spikes, error rates climb.

discovery.text: Define SLOs (service level objectives) for your model: P99 latency < 200ms, error rate < 0.1%.

twist.text: Too many alerts = alert fatigue. Too few = missed incidents. Calibrate carefully.

climax.text: Integrate with PagerDuty, Slack, or OpsGenie for escalation and on-call rotation.

quiz.question: What is an SLO for an ML service?
options: A target performance level like P99 latency < 200ms
